scripts.lint: tslint lib/**/*.ts && tslint test/**/*.ts && tslint bin/*.ts
scripts.pretest: typings install && tsc && npm run lint
scripts.coverage: typings install && tsc && istanbul --include-all-sources cover _mocha test/**/*-test.js -- -R spec && remap-istanbul -i ./coverage/coverage.json -o ./coverage/ts-report -t html && ./node_modules/.bin/remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -t lcovonly > coverage/lcov-ts.info
